title: This 5-in-1 charger is an extra 15% off for the Pre-Black Friday Sale
content:
Charge 4 devices at once with this powerful charging station. The 5-in-1 MagSafe Wireless & Wired Charging Station is on sale for $46.71 if you use the code SAVE15NOV for 15% off during the Pre-Black Friday Sale. 

This 5-in-1 charging station comes with everything you need to keep at your bedside. Charge your phone, watch, AirPods, or any other Qi-enabled device all at the same time. The Apple Watch Stand works for Watcher Series 1 to 6. 

If you’re the type to wake up before the sun or often knock your phone onto the floor looking for it in the dark, you’ll also enjoy this charging station’s night lamp function. It comes with 3 touch-controlled brightness levels. 

You can get the 5-in-1 MagSafe Wireless & Wired Charging Station is on sale for $46.71 (reg. $54.95) if you use the code SAVE15NOV for 15% off during the Pre-Black Friday Sale.

Prices subject to change.
author: DealPost Team
